pack.name: Ptiny
pack.description: Ptiny: The common domains: Continuous, DE, DDF, HDF, Modal, PN, Rendezvous, SDF and SR. The Ptiny pack is required.

pack.name: Full
pack.description: All of the domains, HyVisual and VisualSense.

pack.name: Docs
pack.description: The documentation for Ptiny and the full version of Vergil including user documentation and java documentation.

pack.name: FullDocs
pack.description: The documentation for HyVisual and VisualSense, including user documentation and java documentation.

pack.name: JRE
pack.description: Java Runtime Environment (JRE) v1.5.0_51. This JRE includes JAI, Java 3D, Joystick, JMF, and Rxtx. Ptolemy II requires either a Java Runtime Environment (JRE) or Java Development Kit (JDK). Install the JRE if you want to use the included optional packages. Alternatively, install optionall packages by hand. If you plan on recompiling Ptolemy II, you will need a JDK, not a JRE.
